title: "Kings, Queens, Dukes & Emperors" - with Gloss and Gadgets
itunes:title: "Kings, Queens, Dukes & Emperors" - with Gloss and Gadgets
description:
Use your Ki-Points, add seven, then turn round the corner and do a little dance and stick your left leg in, because today we are talking about what it's like to navigate your way around being a POC in the online TTRPG space, with someone who has been here and CRUSHING it for some time the amazing jack of all trades Gloss & Gadgets.

Gloss & Gadgets: https://twitter.com/GlossandGadgets 

Want more 3BH in your life? You can now buy merchandise here! 

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including Campfire Chats where we dive into each episode of Outlaws & Obelisks.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
